name: C++ Complex Numbers
description: C++ <complex> library implements the complex class to contain complex numbers in cartesian form and several functions and overloads to operate with them

Complex values.val: Returns real part of complex number x
Returns imaginary part of complex number x
Returns absolute value of complex number x
Returns phase angle of complex number x
Returns norm of complex number x
Returns complex from polar components, where x is magnitude of the complex number and y is phase angle of the complex number

Transcendentals overloads.val: Returns the cosine of complex number x
Returns the hyperbolic cosine of complex number x
Returns the base-e exponential of the complex number x
Returns the natural (base-e) logarithm of the complex number x, using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis
Returns the common (base-10) logarithm of the complex number x using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis
Returns the complex power of base x raised to the y-th power using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis
Returns the sine of the complex number x
Returns the hyperbolic sine of the complex number x
Returns the square root of x using the principal branch, whose cuts are along the negative real axis
Returns the tangent of the complex number x
Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the complex number x
Returns the arc cosine of the complex number x (C++11 only)
Returns the arc hyperbolic cosine of the complex number x (C++11 only)
Returns the arc sine of the complex number x (C++11 only)
Returns the arc hyperbolic sine of the complex number x (C++11 only)
Returns the arc tangent of the complex number x (C++11 only)
Returns the arc hyperbolic tangent of the complex number x (C++11 only)
